articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply Message from Syrian President
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a reply message from Syrian President Bashar Al-Assad on Sunday.
					 The president in the message expressed heartfelt thanks to Kim Jong Un, the government and friendly people of the DPRK for sending felicitations on the occasion of the 43rd anniversary of the corrective movement in Syria and hoped that Kim Jong Un would always enjoy good health and his people achieve greater progress and prosperity.
					
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to grow stronger thanks to the common efforts of the two peoples for their interests.

articles.title: Working Plan for Cultural Cooperation between Governments of DPRK, Egypt Signed
articles.content:
Working Plan for Cultural Cooperation between Governments of DPRK, Egypt Signed
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The 2013-2015 working plan for cultural cooperation was signed between the governments of the DPRK and Egypt here on Monday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were Hwang Ho Nam, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Present from the Egyptian side were Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed, Egyptian ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of the Egyptian embassy here.
					
					 The working plan was inked by Hwang Ho Nam and Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed.

articles.title: Law on Sericulture Enacted in DPRK
articles.content:
Law on Sericulture Enacted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Law on sericulture has recently been enacted in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The law, consisting of 44 articles in four chapters, deals with the basic principles and such matters as creation and cultivation of mulberry fields, production and procurement of cocoons and guidance and control over sericulture.
					
					 It is stipulated in the law that the state shall develop exchange and cooperation with other countries and international bodies in the field of sericulture.

articles.title: Honorary Doctorate Awarded to German Figure
articles.content:
Honorary Doctorate Awarded to German Figure
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Honorary Doctorate of Medicine of the DPRK was awarded to Alfred Holzgreve, president of the Germany-DPRK Health Care Forum.
					 He has rendered services for developing heart blood-vessel, chest and cerebral nerve surgeries in the DPRK by establishing the Germany-DPRK Health Care Forum and conducting medical scientific and technological exchanges in various fields.
					
					A ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: DPRK Makes Efforts to Widely Use Wind Energy
articles.content:
DPRK Makes Efforts to Widely Use Wind Energy
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- A brisk campaign for using wind energy is going on in east and west coastal areas and mountainous areas of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Mayong Workers' District, Hanhyon-ri and Songhyon-ri in Onchon County on the west coast introduced a method of using storage batteries in a rational way, whereby to provide five families with electricity produced by one wind power generator. The introduction of wind power generators has reached 70 percent in the area up to now.
					
					 The development of wind energy has been conducted in the country from long ago under the care of the government.
					
					 In the last ten-odd years wind power generators with capacities of 0.3 kw, 1 kw and 5 kw were produced and installed in farm villages and public establishments in different parts of the country.
					
					 At present generators with 10 to 225 kw capacities are used in some east and west coastal areas, including Kwail and Ongjin counties in South Hwanghae Province, Onchon County in Nampho City and Ryongnam and Rason areas.
					
					 Choe In Su, a section chief of the State Planning Commission, told KCNA:
					
					 It is an important part of the national energy development strategy to gradually increase the rate and efficiency of renewable energies including wind energy.
					
					 Our goal is to properly use large-size wind power generators along with small-size ones and raise up to more than 10 percent the share of wind power generating capacity in the country's total electricity output.
					
					 To this end, it is planned to step up the modernization of the wind power industry through joint venture and collaboration with other countries in the production of wind power generators.
					
					 The government designated the Taean Electric Appliances Factory in the western area and the Kim Chaek Wind Power Generator Factory in the eastern area as small-size wind power generator producers.
					
					 Those factories will be updated so that each can produce more than 5 000 wind power generators with capacities of 0.3 to 10 kw every year.

articles.title: KPA Foodstuff Factory Updated
articles.content:
KPA Foodstuff Factory Updated
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Foodstuff Factory No. 354 of the Korean People's Army has been successfully remodeled as required by the IT age.
					 The factory is a foodstuff processing base for mass-producing confectionary and bread for service personnel. 
					
					 Production processes have been updated on a high level and cultured practice is established in production and life.
					
					 Production processes including computer control room, general control room, zeppole and biscuit production processes have been automated and modernized to produce tasty and highly nutritious good-quality confectionary and bread.
					
					 Raw materials are automatically weighed and conveyed, according to the data inputted to a computer, and all other production processes are automated.
					
					 The factory is raising work efficiency and improving quality of products while using not big work force and cutting down production cost as much as possible.
					
					 Women workers are engaged in pleasant labor at the factory without doing manual labor. 
					
					 Praising the workers of the factory for updating it and increasing the production true to the intention of the party, supreme leader Kim Jong Un highly appreciated it as an icon factory and a model foodstuff factory to be proud of.
					
					 He visited it on the Day of Mothers.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Noble Revolutionary Spirit of Seamen
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Noble Revolutionary Spirit of Seamen 
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The heroic feats and spiritual world of seamen of the Korean People's Army who died heroic deaths while performing their combat duty are the example to be followed by all service personnel and people of the DPRK in their lives and struggle, says  Rodong Sinmun Monday in an editorial. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The brave fighters of the East Sea were precious revolutionary soldiers trained under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea and genuine soldiers of the Songun era equipped with the revolutionary soldier spirit. 
					
					 The voyage made by the seamen was that of devotedly defending the leader and that of loyalty as they had always remained true to the party and the leader. 
					
					 Equipped with the transparent spirit of defending the leader, they reliably defended the sea-post of the country to the last moments of their lives, fully aware that they were standing guard over the first-line trench for devotedly defending the leader though they were far away from Pyongyang. 
					
					 The above-said fallen fighters were phoenixes of the sea who showed in practice how to defend the post assigned to them by the party and perform their tasks though they were different from each other in their hometowns, duties, years of service and ages. 
					
					 The noble revolutionary spirit displayed by them was a manifestation of the revolutionary soldier spirit which could be created only by the KPA having the great brilliant commander of Songun as its supreme commander. 
					
					 Though they are no longer with us, they are standing in the van of the Songun revolutionary ranks together with tens of thousands of revolutionary forerunners. 
					
					 All service personnel and people should earnestly learn from their feats and revolutionary spirit and thus make their noble lives shine forever along with the history of comradeship of the Korean revolution and the prosperous Paektusan nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Adhering to Principle"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Authorities' "Theory of Adhering to Principle" 
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- "Theory of adhering to principle" persistently touted by the south Korean puppet group is an anti-reunification theory as it stokes inter-Korean confrontation, denying the spirit of "By our nation itself" and doing harm to national reconciliation and unity.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes this in an article. It goes on:
					
					 The spirit of "By our nation itself" is a common ideal of the nation clarified in the north-south declarations and it is a basic spirit that put spurs to the advance of the June 15 era of reunification. No one can deny that the June 15 era of reunification is a new era of national reconciliation and unity, independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group, however, has desperately stoked distrust and confrontation between compatriots contrary to the principle of "By our nation itself" and negated all the achievements made in the inter-Korean relations in the June 15 era of reunification.
					
					 It is a betrayal of the principle of "By our nation itself" that the puppet group has worked hard to hurt the idea and the social system of the compatriots, refusing to respect and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, cornerstones of independent reunification, peace and prosperity. 
					
					 It is as clear as pikestaff that the puppet group's utmost distrust, hostility and ceaseless provocations to the north are bound to escalate the inter-Korean confrontation, far from improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 The puppet group should bear in mind that it is bound to meet the same disgraceful ruin as what Lee Myung Bak group of traitors did if it sticks to the anti-reunification theory quite contrary to the trend of the times and aspiration of fellow countrymen.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Slandering DPRK over Spread of WMDs
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses U.S. of Slandering DPRK over Spread of WMDs
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Recently U.S. President Obama announced it would extend one year the national emergency situation declared as administration order No. 12398. The U.S. has made such fuss every year since 1994, asserting that WMDs and delivery means of other countries are posing unprecedentedly big threats to its national security, diplomatic policy and economy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 What matters is that the U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK over its alleged spread of WMDs.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. which has stockpiled more offensive weaponry including missiles and nuclear weapons than any other countries in the world and deployed its forces in different parts of the world.
					
					 The building of the missile shield stepped up by the U.S. is not to "protect" itself and other countries and regions from someone's "threat".
					
					 The aim sought by the U.S. in pushing ahead with the building of the missile shield under the fictitious "threat" from the DPRK is to pose an increasing military threat to it and mobilize missiles any moment to stifle it by disabling its strategic deterrence at one blow. It is also designed to make the DPRK's "threat" a fait accompli in a bid to justify its moves for building MD for dominating the world. In other words, it is a major objective of the U.S. to establish MD at any cost under the pretext of the DPRK's "missile threat" and thus contain big powers challenging the U.S. strategy for a unipolar world.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop its foolish act to attain its aim for aggression under the pretext of the DPRK's "nuclear and missile threat".

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Sparking Off Social Crisis
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Sparking Off Social Crisis
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean weekly paper Media Today on Nov. 14 carried an editorial slamming the puppet ruling forces for sparking off a social crisis.
					 The editorial noted with concern that society is taking a dangerous road though it is several months since Park Geun Hye took office.
					
					 Despite increasing evidence proving the interference of power organs in the election Park does not admit this, it deplored.
					
					 The regime, the ruling party and reactionary forces including conservative media are indiscriminately cracking down on labor union organizations at a time when the improvement of people's living and economic recovery are urgently required, it charged.
					
					 The atmosphere of voicing opposition to the present chief executive is running high among even those who voted for her in the past election as the above-said actions are sparking off a social crisis, it said.
					
					 The editorial held that the Park Geun Hye regime, the ruling party and conservative media are taking the road of setback.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution's Biased Investigation Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution's Biased Investigation Assailed
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean organizations and opposition parties on Nov. 14 assailed the puppet prosecution for its repressive move to make full-dress investigation into members of the Government Employees Union and the Teachers Union on the suspicion that they expressed their views on the candidates during the past "presidential election".
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions termed the prosecution's investigation a ploy to gloss over the illegal interference of power organs in the election and a crackdown on progressive organizations.
					
					 A spokesman for the Democratic Party said that the prosecution is working hard to investigate unionists at a high speed though it read other's face while making an investigation into the organized interference of power organs in the election.
					
					 Can the gravity of the organized interference of power organs in the election be compared with unionists' expression of individual views, he queried.
					
					 Such behavior of the prosecution cannot but cast doubt that it is a retaliatory investigation conducted at the instruction of the regime, he charged.
					
					 A spokesman for the Justice Party ridiculed that if this is allowed to happen, all those who did not support Park Geun Hye may become targets of investigation.
					
					 It is better for the prosecution to abandon investigation if it has an intention to tide over the crisis by cracking down on ordinary organizations while sidestepping the investigation into the illegal acts which should be properly probed, he noted.
					
					 The regime should no longer keep mum about the strong demand of the people for thorough investigation into the illegal actions of power organs, he stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Unreasonable Suppression of Teachers Union under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Unreasonable Suppression of Teachers Union under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea held a press conference on Nov. 13 at which it declared the suppression of the union unjust.
					 It said that on the same day the Seoul Administration Court accepted the "application for terminating the validity of the outlawed trade union" made by the Teachers Union against the Ministry of Employment and Labor.
					
					 It also said that the notice made by the authorities about "the outlawed trade union" was flatly refuted.
					
					 It demanded the regime abide by the agreed point of the "labor-management-government committee" which decided to recognize the dismissed as unionists and the minister of Employment and Labor and the minister of Education step down.

articles.title: Martyr Jon Thae Il Remembered by Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
Martyr Jon Thae Il Remembered by Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. held a memorial service in Los Angeles on Nov. 13, 43 years since martyr Jon Thae Il committed self-immolation in protest against the dictatorial regime of south Korea.
					 At the service speakers said Jon's self-immolation on Nov. 13, 1970 was like a bullet fired by him at Park Chung-Hee in protest against the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 This shocking event led to the end of the Park Chung-Hee's military dictatorial regime and afterwards the labor movement has steadily grown in strength, they noted.
					
					 Jon's fighting spirit always remains recorded in the history of the south Korean labor movement and the movement for democracy, they stressed.

articles.title: Western Weightlifting at Crisis: News Analyst
articles.content:
Western Weightlifting at Crisis: News Analyst
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Some sports events including weightlifting are now at a crisis in capitalist society with sports on a commercial basis. 
					 Recently reporting about the 2013 World Weightlifting Championship in Wroclaw of Poland, China's Xinhua said Western countries have become so weak in weightlifting.
					
					 In fact, none of the U.S., UK, German, Canadian, French and Italian players won a medal in the championship where the players competed for the total of 135 medals.
					
					 Britain has bagged no weightlifting medal since it took a gold medal in the 1st Olympiad in 1896. And it was the last time for the United States to get an Olympic gold in Rome in 1960.
					
					 Spain has never got an Olympic gold in the weightlifting event, while "sports powers" in Europe and North America have not shown good results in weightlifting for many years. 
					
					 In this regard, an ex-chief coach of the U.S. weightlifting team told that no one could live on weightlifting in his country because what is decisive of the sports development in the U.S. is market and what is decisive of its demand is not Olympic gold medal but people's interest. 
					
					 His remarks give a glimpse of American society where sport is abused as a means for moneymaking.
					
					 As a matter of fact, in capitalist society the national sports development depends on market, not on the state policy, and making money is regarded more important than to display nation's honor.
					
					 So, Western countries have no proper system for upgrading the weightlifting event and, consequently, promising weightlifters can hardly develop their talents.
					
					 A French weightlifter deplored that they could not give full play to their ability in international tournaments because of poor coaching and training method, saying that there was no supply of practice equipment and foodstuffs. 
					
					 A British weightlifting coach said that there had been promising weightlifters in the country, including a strongman who successfully lifted 177kg in snatch and 215 kg in clean and jerk at the age of 17, but all of them gave up weightlifting.
					
					 This is a tragedy produced by the depraved capitalist system in which money decides everything.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering  General Secretary Kim Jong Il was inaugurated at the building of the Diversity Party of Indonesia on Nov. 12.
					 Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to fix a remembrance period from Nov. 13 to Dec. 17 and hold colorful political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Organ of Swedish Political Party Flays S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Progressive Forces
articles.content:
Organ of Swedish Political Party Flays S. Korean Regime's Crackdown on Progressive Forces
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Proretaren, the organ of the Communist Party of Sweden, on Nov. 4 carried an article titled "S. Korean conservative 'government' invokes undemocratic laws."
					 It accused the south Korean conservative regime of kicking up a repressive racket against political parties and organizations on charges of "violating the constitution".
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities arrested leading members of the Unified Progressive Party calling for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and searched the houses and offices of those concerned.
					
					 They are also working hard to dissolve the Teachers Union labeling it "core forces following the north".
					
					 The south Korean progressive forces are condemning such an action as the one to bring the south Korean society back to the era of the past military dictatorship.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Indonesian Figure
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Nurdin Purnomo, chairman of the National Leading Council of the Diversity Party of Indonesia, lauded General Secretary Kim Jong Il as the greatest man at an inaugural ceremony of the committee for remembering  him held on Nov. 12.
					 The great contribution made by Kim Jong Il to the world peace and the human cause of independence will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but the Indonesian people and all other progressive people.

articles.title: Foreign Media Report about Statement of Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department
articles.content:
Foreign Media Report about Statement of Spokesman for DPRK NDC Policy Department
 Pyongyang, November 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign media on Nov. 15 reported about the statement issued by a spokesman for the Policy Department of the DPRK National Defence Commission chiding Park Geun Hye for making trips to foreign countries during which she revealed her true colors as a despicable sycophant, traitor and  diehard maniac for confrontation with compatriots.
					 Xinhua News quoted the spokesman as saying that during her junkets to West European countries early this month  she revealed her true colors as a despicable sycophant and traitor and a maniac for confrontation with compatriots.
					
					 ITAR-TASS noted that the statement clarified the DPRK's will to consistently implement its line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force in order to defend the sovereignty of the nation.
					
					 The statement dismissed Park’s remarks on the issue of the north-south summit as hypocritical.
					
					 Kyodo and Jiji released the similar news.

articles.title: Firmado plan de ejecucion de cooperacion cultural 2013-2015 entre RPDC y Egipto
articles.content:
Firmado plan de ejecucion de cooperacion cultural 2013-2015 entre RPDC y Egipto
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 18 en esta capital el plan de ejecucion de la cooperacion cultural 2013-2015 entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Arabe de Egipto. 
					En la ceremonia de firmas estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana el vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Hwang Ho Nam, y otros funcionarios, y por la contraparte, el embajador Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica egipcia en Corea. 
					
					Hwang Ho Nam e Iman Mostafa Abdou Ahmed firmaron el documento.

articles.title: Instituida ley de sericultura en RPDC
articles.content:
Instituida ley de sericultura en RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, quedo instituida en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea la ley de sericultura que tiene 4 capitulos y 44 articulos.
					En la nueva ley estan estipulados legalmente los principios fundamentales de la ley y los problemas que se presentan en la formacion y cultivo de morerales, la produccion y acopio de capullos de gusano de seda y la direccion y control sobre la rama.
					
					Menciona ademas los temas relacionados con el intercambio y cooperacion internacionales.
					
					La ley establece que el Estado debe desarrollar el intercambio y la cooperacion con otros paises y organizaciones internacionales en la sericultura.

articles.title: Conferido doctorado a personalidad alemana
articles.content:
Conferido doctorado a personalidad alemana
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Fue otorgado el titulo de doctor honoris causa en medicina de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a Alfred Holzgreve, presidente del Forum de Salud Publica Alemania-RPDC.
					Alfred Holzgreve organizo el citado forum y contribuyo al desarrollo de vasos cardiacos, torax y medicina externa de nervio cerebral de Corea mediante el intercambio de ciencias y tecnicas medicinas de varios sectores.
					
					Tuvo lugar hoy en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae la ceremonia de entrega.

articles.title: Se amplia uso de energia eolica en RPDC
articles.content:
Se amplia uso de energia eolica en RPDC
Pyongyang, 18 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se utiliza ampliamente la energia eolica.
					Este ano, se instalaron aerogeneradores en muchas unidades y familias de las zonas costeras orientales y occidentales y las montanosas del pais, de modo que ellas se separaran de la red de abastecimiento electrico estatal.
					
					La comunidad obrera de Mayong del distrito de Onchon y las comunas de Hanhyon y Songhyon en las costas occidentales introdujeron el racional metodo de bateria electrica que permite a 5 familias usar juntas la electricidad producida por un aerogenerador.
					
					Hasta la fecha, la introduccion de energia eolica en esa zona llego al 70%.
					
					El desarrollo del recurso energetico natural comenzo hace mucho tiempo bajo la atencion del Estado.
					
					Durante mas de diez anos, se colocaron los aerogeneradores con capacidades de 0.3kW, 1kW y 5kW en muchas familias campesinas y unidades.
					
					Usan los aerogeneradores de 10-225kW algunas regiones costeras, inclusive los distritos de Kwail y Ongjin de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur, el distrito de Onchon de la ciudad de Nampho y las zonas de Ryongnam y Rason.
					
					El jefe de departamento del Comite Estatal de Planificacion, Choe In Su, dijo a la ACNC que aumentar el uso de energia eolica y otras renovables positivas al medioambiente y elevar su eficacia son claves de la estrategia estatal de desarrollo energetico.
					
					Tratamos de elevar mas de 10% la tasa de aerogeneracion en la capacidad productiva general de electricidad al usar principalmente los aerogeneradores de gran tamano conforme a la tendencia mundial y combinarlos con los otros pequenos, explico.
					
					Tenemos el plan de realizar la asociacion y la coproduccion con otros paises en la fabricacion de aerogeneradores grandes y pequenos, apunto.
					
					Segun las medidas estatales, fueron definidas como bases especiales en la produccion de aerogeneradores pequenos la Fabrica Electrica de Taean para la region occidental y la Fabrica de Aerogenerador Kim Chaek para la zona oriental, preciso.
					
					En el futuro, esa fabricas se modernizaran para producir cada cual mas de 5 mil aerogeneradores de 0.3kW-10kW anualmente, que se colocaran en las zonas rurales, islas apartadas, campos de trabajo en montana, faroles y las estaciones de retransmision de comunicaciones y TV.
